question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task. You and your family are living in rented accommodation in an English speaking country. You are not satisfied with the condition of some of the furniture. 
Write a letter to your landlord. In your letter introduce yourself explain what is wrong with the furniture say what action you would like the landlord to take You do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: How are you ?  I hope you are doing well.  I am writing this letter because we have been facing multiple problems  in my new apartment due to the state of furniture in my condo.

Let me explain my situation in detail. I and  my family recently moved to Toronto from India due to my work purpose and we are new to Canada. Moving to a different nation was very difficult for us. My wife is facing multiple problems ,especially while cooking as the dining table is not stable .As well as we have to face the problems of bugs all over the apartment especially on the sofa, bed and the kids' room as well.

We kindly request you to take immediate action on this situation  as the bugs as the biggest fear for my wife and my kids. You can call Pest Control Team to observe this problem. We have been paying the rent regularly also I request you change all tables and chairs due to their stability.
